pages.ready_to_join: Ready to join our tattoo artists catalog?

main.title: Discover Tattoo World now!
main.subtitle: Dive into the exciting catalog of outstanding tattoo artists and studios. Discover their stunning works, experience, and styles, all in one place!

about_block.subtitle_1: Welcome to the catalog of the finest tattoo artists’ works from across Europe. Our platform showcases their works, and by using personal TattooLog ratings, you can confidently make a choice when You selecting an artist.
about_block.subtitle_1_2: Rest assured, TattooLog will help you find a professional capable of bringing any ideas to life and creating a work of art. Our catalog provides a reliable foundation for decision-making, making it easier for you to find the best artist for you. Don't waste time – start your search for your specialist on TattooLog!
about_block.subtitle_2: In our catalog, you'll find bold color palettes, geometric patterns, inspiration from various cultures, and much more. Explore, create your own personal ratings, and be inspired because the world of tattoos on TattooLog is brimming with diverse ideas and creativity.

why_us_block.subtitle_1: Looking for an opportunity? Join the Tattoolog association and boost your career.
why_us_block.subtitle_2: Tattoo artist members enjoy equipment discounts, festival entries, and championship participation.
why_us_block.subtitle_3: View the portfolio with artworks of tattoo artists on our platform, where we showcase their best works.

join_us_block.title: Can’t wait to get a taste of tattoo stardom? Click the button below, fill out a simple form about yourself and your work, and join our catalogue. Let the world witness the outstanding talent that is you.

additional_block.title: How to showcase yourself on our platform?
additional_block.subtitle: After registering, it's essential to set up your profile by specifying your unique tattoo style preferences, location, and a description about yourself, so that clients can easily find you.
additional_block.subtitle_1: For personal promotion in the catalog, we recommend regularly updating your gallery with sketches and works.

block_1.title: How do I join the platform?
block_1.content: Register for an account on our website, then set up your profile and start exploring the fantastic art and community.

block_2.title: Is that free?
block_2.content: Certainly, it's absolutely free to join the catalog. You will have the opportunity for self-made recognition and a chance to promote your works and showcase your talent.

block_3.title: How long would I be a member of the catalog?
block_3.content: It's permanent and available without any trial period. However, you can edit your profile at any time, and if you choose, you can delete it entirely.

artists_page.title: Unleash Your Inner Canvas
artists_page.subtitle: Discover top-notch tattoo artists and their jaw-dropping creations
artists_page.subtitle_1: TattooLog is a platform for both professionals and tattoo enthusiasts. Professionals in the tattoo industry can establish their presence beyond their city and country by showcasing their best works on the platform and elevating their ranking in the European community of tattoo artists. TattooLog's portfolio is your gateway to the world of amazing tattoo art. Discover a multitude of tattoo artists with unique styles, ratings, and stunning designs that will leave you craving for more ink. From delicate watercolor drawings to intricate realism, our platform provides the perfect environment for both tattoo enthusiasts and passionate artists.

1.title: Global Reach
1.subtitle: Discover exceptional talent from artists based in every corner of the world.

2.title: Top Rated
2.subtitle: Experience the remarkable works of top-rated tattoo artists worldwide.

3.title: Amazing Art
3.subtitle: Feast your eyes on jaw-dropping masterpieces etched on human canvases.

4.title: Ink Locator
4.subtitle: Find the tattoo that calls out to you and the artist who brought it to life.

join.title: Ready to Join Our Tattoo Artist Catalogue?
join.subtitle: Don’t miss out on the opportunity to be part of our ever-growing tattoo artist network. Showcase your artistry and gain well-deserved recognition.

studios_page.title: Inked paradise — this is where the best converge
studios_page.subtitle: Stunning Studios List
studios_page.subtitle_1: Immerse yourself in the world of the best tattoo studios where only top-rated tattoo artists work. We've carefully selected the most deserving studios featuring renowned tattoo masters. Our catalog showcases a blend of talent, creativity, and passion that knows no bounds. Unleash your inner individualist by visiting these marvelous tattoo studios.

1.title: Stellar Artists
1.subtitle: Handpicked artistic talent at studios with extraordinary creativity.

2.title: Safety First
2.subtitle: Studios where sterility and hygiene are an absolute priority.

3.title: Customer Love
3.subtitle: Studios with high-rated reviews and dedicated followings.

join.title: Ready to Join Our Tattoo Studio Catalogue?
join.subtitle: The cult of tattoo legends — where innovation meets inspiration and forever transforms your body canvas. Escape into the immersive realm of artistic odysseys and treasure the opportunity to adorn your skin with timeless masterpieces.

validation.error_password: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.error_password_2: Password must include at least one uppercase letter and a special character
